answers.answer: My sis is preggo with twins and is 37 weeks
Your welcome they told her if she doesn't have them by week 38 weeks they will induce good luck girl

In 2011 I had a csection with my twins. I was 37 weeks 4 days. I wasn't even dialated a fingertip and no effacement. So yes very normal to carry twins to 38 wks.  The only reason I didn't make it to 38 wks are more is that I had gestational diabetes and it was becoming unmanagable with meds and then I started getting preeclampsia. My twins were; 6lbs14oz. And 5lbs 6oz.  no nicu needed.
I'm prego with twins and my doc says they won't let us go past 38 weeks but I'm hoping they'll come at 36..btw..no c-section for me unless absolutely necessary..

It can be normal depending on the type of twins u have and ur health. Are ypurs fraternal or identical?. Fraternal twins usually go the longest because they have their own sac and placenta. Identical can be tricky depending on if they share a placenta or embrionic sac which can cause them to grow slower and get more cramped up which causes the need for an early delivery.

question: Hi im 34 weeks pregnant w twins nd their doing a c/section @ 38 weeks is it normal to carry twins that long I know I have problems dilating nd im still closed bt can have contractions all day long nd nt be dilated. Im just curious
title: Pregnant with twins
